not_finished.en: [STUDENT] hasn't finished a course yet. Let's make it happen!
not_finished.cn: [STUDENT] 尚未完成任何课程。让我们一起实现吧！

template.en: The [COURSE] is a prestigious event recognized worldwide, including in the USA, for fostering top coding talent and problem-solving abilities. Participation in this competition will give [STUDENT] the opportunity to apply skills in a high-pressure, real-world setting, enhancing [STUDENT]'s technical abilities such as programming, algorithms, and debugging. Excelling in [COURSE] will significantly boost [STUDENT]'s portfolio, showcasing [STUDENT]'s capacity to succeed in competitive environments.
template.cn: [COURSE] 是一项享誉全球的知名赛事，包括在美国，也因培养顶尖编码人才和解决问题的能力而受到认可。参与此赛事将使 [STUDENT] 有机会在高压的现实环境中运用技能，提升 [STUDENT] 在编程、算法和调试等方面的技术能力。在 [COURSE] 中表现出色将极大地提升 [STUDENT] 的作品集，展示 [STUDENT] 在竞争性环境中取得成功的能力

none_available.en: [STUDENT] doesn't have a competition planned yet. Let's make it happen!
none_available.cn: [STUDENT] 尚未计划参加任何比赛。让我们一起实现吧！

template.en: Our coding projects are an initiative that challenges participants to create innovative solutions from the ground up. This project will help [STUDENT] build essential technical skills, including product development, coding integration, and system design. Additionally, [STUDENT] will enhance leadership, project management, and effective communication skills, which are critical for success in both team and solo projects. Successfully completing a project will provide a standout accomplishment for [STUDENT]'s portfolio.
template.cn: 我们的编码项目是一项倡议，旨在挑战参与者从零开始创建创新解决方案。该项目将帮助 [STUDENT] 培养重要的技术技能，包括产品开发、代码集成和系统设计。此外，[STUDENT] 将提升领导力、项目管理和高效沟通能力，这些技能对于团队合作和独立项目的成功至关重要。成功完成项目将为 [STUDENT] 的作品集增添一项突出的成就。

none_available.en: [STUDENT] doesn't have a project planned yet. Let's make it happen!
none_available.cn: [STUDENT] 尚未计划任何项目。让我们一起实现吧！

template.en: The [COURSE] class is the ideal foundation for [STUDENT]'s success in competitions and projects, offering critical intermediate-level programming concepts. These technical skills will enable [STUDENT] to tackle more complex coding challenges and develop efficient, scalable solutions, preparing [STUDENT] for higher-level competitions and projects. By taking [COURSE], [STUDENT] is well prepared for future opportunities in both academic settings and technology careers, positioning [STUDENT] to take on more advanced challenges with confidence.
template.cn: [COURSE] 课程是 [STUDENT] 在比赛和项目中取得成功的理想基础，提供关键的中级编程概念。这些技术技能将使 [STUDENT] 能够应对更复杂的编码挑战，并开发高效、可扩展的解决方案，为更高级别的比赛和项目做好准备。通过学习 [COURSE]，[STUDENT] 为未来的学术机会和技术职业奠定了坚实的基础，使 [STUDENT] 能够自信地迎接更高难度的挑战。

none_available.en: [STUDENT] doesn't have new course planned yet. Let's make it happen!
none_available.cn: [STUDENT] 尚未计划新的课程。让我们一起实现吧！

preface.en: At the core of our program lies a commitment to equipping [STUDENT] with the skills, mindset, and experiences necessary to excel in [STUDENT]'s academic pursuits and future career. By focusing on three key pillars, we aim to guide [STUDENT] toward becoming a well-rounded, innovative, and competitive individual in an ever-expanding world.
preface.cn: 我们的课程核心是致力于为 [STUDENT] 提供在学术追求和未来职业中脱颖而出所需的技能、心态和经验。通过专注于三个关键支柱，我们旨在引导 [STUDENT] 成为一个全面发展、创新且具有竞争力的人才，以应对不断扩展的世界。

title.en: Goal 1. Excel in the AI-Driven Feature
title.cn: 目标 1：在人工智能驱动的功能中表现卓越

text.en: As technology continues to advance at an unprecedented pace, it is vital for [STUDENT] to master the tools and knowledge required to remain competitive in an AI-driven era. Our program will provide [STUDENT] with a solid grounding in programming, problem-solving, and advanced concepts like machine learning, algorithms, and data structures. Beyond technical skills, [STUDENT] will gain insights into the ethical and practical applications of AI in the real world, preparing him to tackle challenges and contribute meaningfully to technological innovation. This foundation will position [STUDENT] as a leader in the workforce, ready to adapt to and shape the future of technology.
text.cn: 随着科技以空前的速度不断发展，[STUDENT] 掌握在人工智能驱动的时代中保持竞争力所需的工具和知识至关重要。我们的课程将为 [STUDENT] 提供扎实的编程、问题解决能力，以及机器学习、算法和数据结构等高级概念的基础。除了技术技能外，[STUDENT] 还将深入了解人工智能在现实世界中的伦理和实际应用，为应对挑战并在技术创新中做出有意义的贡献做好准备。这一基础将使 [STUDENT] 在职场中脱颖而出，能够适应并引领未来科技的发展。

title.en: Goal 2. Build a Standout College Portfolio
title.cn: 目标 2：打造出色的大学申请作品集

text.en: To stand out in competitive college applications, [STUDENT] needs a profile that reflects not only academic excellence but also diverse achievements and experiences. Through our program, [STUDENT] will engage in high-impact competitions, complete innovative projects, and demonstrate leadership and teamwork in collaborative settings. These accomplishments will showcase [STUDENT]'s ability to overcome challenges, think critically, and deliver results. Admissions committees value candidates with a unique blend of technical skills and personal qualities, and [STUDENT]'s portfolio will emphasize [STUDENT]'s proactive approach, creativity, and dedication to growth, making [STUDENT] a compelling choice for top-tier universities.
text.cn: 在竞争激烈的大学申请中，[STUDENT] 需要一个不仅体现学术卓越，还展现多样化成就和经验的个人资料。通过我们的课程，[STUDENT] 将参与高影响力的比赛，完成创新项目，并在协作环境中展现领导力和团队合作能力。这些成就将展示 [STUDENT] 克服挑战、批判性思考和取得成果的能力。招生委员会重视具备技术技能与个人品质独特结合的候选人，而 [STUDENT] 的作品集将突出其积极主动的态度、创造力和对成长的投入，使 [STUDENT] 成为顶尖大学的有力竞争者。

title.cn: 目标 3：培养创业思维方式

text.en: An entrepreneurial mindset is essential for navigating the complexities of modern challenges and creative impactful solutions. Our program encourages [STUDENT] to think like an innovator -- identifying real-world problems, developing creative solutions, and executing projects from concepts to completion. By working hands-on projects that simulate the dynamics of a startup, [STUDENT] will hone leadership, project management, and problem-solving skills. This experience will prepare [STUDENT] to take bold, calculated risks and turn [STUDENT]'s ideas into reality, whether as an entrepreneur or as a leader in [STUDENT]'s chosen field.
text.cn: 创业思维对于应对现代挑战的复杂性并创造有影响力的解决方案至关重要。我们的课程鼓励 [STUDENT] 像创新者一样思考——识别现实问题，开发创造性解决方案，并将项目从概念转化为成果。通过参与模拟初创企业动态的实践项目，[STUDENT] 将磨练领导力、项目管理和问题解决能力。这种经验将使 [STUDENT] 能够大胆且理性地承担风险，将 [STUDENT] 的想法变为现实，无论是作为企业家还是在 [STUDENT] 所选领域中成为一名领导者。

question.cn: 这个计划的路径是永久的吗?

answer.en: No, this is tentative. In the future, your child's interests may change, we may stop offering classes, or we might introduce a new class that sparks a newfound interest in your child.
answer.cn: 不，这只是暂时的。未来，您的孩子的兴趣可能会发生变化，我们可能会停止提供课程，或者我们可能会引入新的课程，激发您孩子的新兴趣。

question.en: What happens if my child's interests change?
question.cn: 如果我的孩子的兴趣发生变化，会怎么样？

answer.en: Schedule another meeting with us so we can change the pathway to reflect their new interests.
answer.cn: 安排另一次会议，我们可以调整路径以反映他们的新兴趣。

question.en: I want to change the classes listed here.
question.cn: 我想更改这里列出的课程。

answer.en: Schedule another meeting with us so we can change the pathway to reflect how you want it.
answer.cn: 安排另一次会议，我们可以调整路径以符合您的需求。
